title: Longest-serving woman in Congress says she’s not stopping anytime soon - Roll Call
snippet: Ohio Rep. Marcy Kaptur, here at an event in Toledo last year, is the longest-serving woman in congressional history. (Tom Williams/CQ Roll Call) By Daniela Altimari Posted June 23, 2025 at 6:47pm

title: Rep. Marcy Kaptur [D-OH9, 1983-2026], Representative for Ohio's 9th Congressional District - GovTrack.us
snippet: Legislative Preview Dec. 15, 2025: Congress's Last Week of Work of the Year » ... Kaptur is the representative for Ohio’s 9th congressional district (view map) and is a Democrat. She has served since Jan. 3, 1983. Kaptur is next up for reelection in 2026 and serves until Jan.
